name: Wailun Shooters
description:
Wailun Shooters is a arcade shooter game. The goal? Get the highest possible highscore. Is the normal mode to easy for you? Try hardcore. Tired of using the same pistol? There are 4 weapons to choose from. When you are done playing, you can go to "My profile" and save your game. Next time you play you can load your data.

Gamemodes

There are two basic gamemodes:

  • Normal - 10hp
  • Hardcore - 1hp

The gamemodes have separate highscores. More gamemodes coming soon.

Weapons

There are 4 weapons:

  • Desert Eagle - basic pistol, 1 - 2 damage
  • 417 - assault rifle, huge firerate
  • AWP - sniper rifle, big fast projectiles, instakills all enemies
  • Remote Bomb - a C-4 type explosive, can be thrown at the ground and later detonated.

Enemies

For now, there are only 2 enemies:

  • Red enemy - basic enemy, slow move speed, 1 damage
  • Blue enemy - speedy boi, increased move speed, 2 damage

Credits

Music - "Electroman Adventures" by Waterflame

Weapon Sprites - "Pixel art guns with firing animations" by  GG_Undroid_Games

Explosion Animations - "Five Free Pixel Eplosions" by unTied Games
